item.title: Now #BLM wants to erase #StLouis, and they don't care who gets hurt. #AntiCatholic via @Mattphilbin
item.description: You may not find many in business, universities, Congress or the Chief Justice of the United States’s office, but there are still Catholics out there willing to defend the Church, decency and civilization.
item.dc:creator: Matt Philbin

item.title: .@amandaseales Hosts BET Awards, 'Black Everything,' 'Karen-Free'
item.description: Just when you thought the BET awards could not get any more woke, the host performs a skit on video chat, pretending to be a white woman afraid of black people. But then again, what is the best way for BET to make their fan base feel victimized, while simultaneously promoting the marxist Black Lives Matter movement?
item.dc:creator: Julie Mitchell

item.title: WHAT? Fox Streaming Platform Will Feature @LouisFarrakhan’s ‘Message’ from ‘God’ On July 4 @foxsoultv
item.description: As American society continues to convulse over the demands of politically-divisive, race-baiting groups like Black Lives Matter, one prominent TV network decided that showcasing a full speech from black supremacist and anti-semite Louis Farrakhan on the 4th of July would be a great idea.
item.dc:creator: Gabriel Hays

item.title: Media, Politicians Launch Renewed Attack on Redskins
item.description: Opponents of the Redskins nickname are on the warpath with renewed fury, combining the efforts of media, activists and politicians to call upon team members to refuse to play for Washington.
item.dc:creator: Jay Maxson

item.title: Beyoncé at 'The BET Awards 2020': Vote, Our Lives Depend On It via @penguinponders
item.description: The coronavirus pandemic is doing strange things to awards shows. The shows, including the acceptance speeches, are pre-taped and shown virtually which makes for less spontaneous lectures from our woke betters in the entertainment world.
item.dc:creator: Karen Townsend

item.title: .@Showtime's The Chi: 'The Gayest Season Ever' via @RebeccaRoseGold
item.description: “It’s definitely the gayest season ever,” declared Lena Waithe, creator of Showtime’s The Chi, which is in its third season, when she appeared on The Late Late Show with James Corden. Last week’s season premiere opened up with a wedding between two women, which Waithe lauded.
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Downs

item.title: Livestock Agent Kills Prisoners While Sending ‘Message’ on #YellowstoneTV #ParamountNetwork #TVviolence
item.description: Trouble is headed the Duttons’ way again on Yellowstone. In the premiere, John Dutton resigned as livestock commissioner and appointed his son Jamie. This week, in Sunday's episode “Freight Trains and Monsters,” Jamie stepped into his father’s shoes and then promptly into a mess sure to haunt himself and the family.
item.dc:creator: Julia A. Seymour

item.title: .@Starz Hightown: F*** @realDonaldTrump
item.description:
Starz’s Hightown has it all. June 28’s episode, "Everybody’s Got a Cousin" contains the random opportunity to mention “global warming” and curse President Donald Trump. 

In the episode, fisherman Michael McCarthy (Michael Park) joins in on bashing Trump when Jackie Quiñones, an officer of the National Marine Fisheries Services, comes sniffing around his boat.
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Downs

item.title: White Feminist @laurenarankin of @Refinery29 Declares TN Pro-life Bill ‘Racist,’ ‘White Supremacy’ via @AlexaShrugged
item.description: Lauren Rankin is a white, pro-abortion feminist who wants to bring attention to a new pro-life law in Tennessee that’s become lost amidst the Black Lives Matter protests.
item.dc:creator: Alexa Moutevelis

item.title: LeBron James Expands Communication Network, Beefs Up Social Justice Agenda
item.description: Without missing a beat in his work to stop black voter suppression and get President Donald Trump out of office in November, LeBron James and friends have raised $100 million for his SpringHill Entertainment Company to contract with Disney for scripted television.
item.dc:creator: Jay Maxson
